fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Divine Power** — You start with 7 power. When you use an ability, add or subtract power according to the ability. You may not use abilities that cost more power than you have. If you would be attacked, instead the attacker learns that your Defense was too strong and you lose power equal to the level of the attack— Basic: 1, Powerful: 2, Unstoppable: 3, Overkill+: 4. You still die if you're hanged.
- Roleblock, redirect, detection, and conversion immunity

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
`+2`: Choose a player. You learn a random one of their abilities and gain one use of that ability, but you may use it at any time and it resolves immediately.
`+1`: Deal an Unstoppable attack to any player.
`-7`: Every other player chooses one of their abilities. They lose the chosen abilities.
`-12`: All other players lose all abilities, attributes, immunities, and defense for the rest of the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.
